price: У ерда уларга истаган нарсалари бор. Яна Бизнинг ҳузуримиздаги қўшимча ҳам.
arabic: لَهُم مَّا يَشَآءُونَ فِيهَا وَلَدَيۡنَا مَزِيدٞ

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: lahum mā yashāūna fīhā waladaynā mazīdun
